data.title: dramas + Anime
data.meta_description: Read stories about #boysoverflowers, #ahnsukhwan, and #bumpkin on Wattpad, recommended by KPOPfan619
data.text:
They Don't Know about Us!! ^_^

Every teardrop is precious so better make sure that if you drop some, it’s worth crying for you can never pick them up and put them back to your eyes.Don’t force yourself to fall in love just because you think it’s your turn. Wait for a while, maybe cupids are having a hard time searching for the heart that deserves t...

Life After (A Boys Over Flowers Fanfiction)

Ever wonder what happened to the lives of our beloved characters from the hit Korean Drama, Boys Over Flowers as they reunite again after 4 years at the ending. *** This story is only a work of fiction, of my playful imagination, this is what I thought happened after the story ends w...

Because Of Every Why's [ONE SHOT]

If you want to make your day lighter and brighter, here's a one-shot for you. A simple romantic fluff for everyone. ❤️Spreading the love of this couple named Yi Jeong and Ga Eul. What do you think are the because of that every why's? Find out and read! :)

Completed

The Search is Over

Four years ago, Yi Jeong had left for Sweden to search for his self and his heart again. He has rediscovered his self through pottery. Now, he only needs to search for his heart and he realized… he knew exactly where he'll find it...

Be My Girl: Boys Over Flowers

What if jandi finds out that she has a twin sister??? What if jandi's parents are not her real parents??? Then how did she became their daughter??? Who is her real parents? What if jihoo falls in love with jandi's twin sister??? Yijung has a secret which no one knows...what is it??? How will others react when they fi...

Mature

Ga Eul ♡ Yi Jung

A fanfiction about YiJung & GaEul of "Boys Over Flowers " Ga Eul's a very successful woman and so is So Yi Jung's a very successful man. They've known each other since childhood. One is afraid to fall in love while the other is afraid to get rejected. But what will happen if their emotions get out of hand? The s...

XiYou Deal Chapter Story

A lengthy one-shot fanfic. Novella-like. Premise: What if Meteor Garden 2018 followed the ending in the manga for Xi Men and Xiao You? After the second rooftop scene, instead of getting together they just had sex.

Completed Mature

Are WE for Real?

Yi Jeong is Ga Eul's god brother but they don't get along that well but when he seeks her help to shoo away a woman who's totally obsessed with him, she find herself agreeing. "It's just an act! Nothing more...."they thought.

soEulmates The kidnapper (On Hold)

The normal rich girl Ga Eul get's kidnaped by an "evil" family. boys over flower fanfiction I do not own the characters of the story this story is about the ship soEulmates, this is simply fanfiction I Don't think this story is "original" but I tried my best. I will complete this sto...

Mature

Look At Me Now

Julianna Louise Mendoza is already a successful woman of her age. She is a young lawyer and was immediately hired by a big company right after her graduation in Law School. She passed the Bar Exam at the age of 25 and being 26 years old at the present, she already solved a lot of cases and became one of her boss's fa...

The Story of Us

Claire is smart, beautiful, rich and competative. She will be going to her new school with her bestfriends. She loves to run. One day came the new student. He is also smart, handsome and rich. He beats Claire in everything that Claire is good at. Everywhere they go, they are always fighting. What would Claire do to re...

A Forbidden Love

Chu Ga Eul was well...poor. There was nothing special about her. She was just another girl who suffers poverty. But an accident has caused her to enter Shinwa school,the most prestigious school in South Korea. So Yi Joeng was THE Casanova. He could not walk around without girls falling to his feet,literally.Along with...

Obsessed [Kim So Eun & Kim Bum]

I know SoEul couple had been overthrown however I wrote this way back in 2009 and I never got the chance to end it; hence, I really want to continue this story. This is about every fan girl in each everyone of us, but it took one particular girl to become a saseang and push every limit to make her dream come true. The...

Just Like A Roller Coaster [ON GOING]

Here's a ticket on a rollercoaster ride in love. Enjoy! PS. If you want a little appetizer, read my one-shot story Because of Every Why's. ❤

[BOF's] Yi-jung and Ga-eul Take Two: The Side Story

From the most ever successful Jun-pyo and Jan-di’s happily ever after love story, Boys Over Flowers, Let us fall in love again as we give way to a whole new drama, friendship, heartbreaks, and of course, falling in love. Remembering the feeling of the first time...

You Are In Love

It was only one time...But one time was all it took. First comes baby, than comes marriage, and then comes Love? (Song title taken from Taylor Swift Song by the same name.)

Mature

Future Children ( UtaPri )

While Nanami Haruka was composing, many children suddenly appear with the smoke. The children was slightly familiar looks like Starish, Quartet Night and her. What she was surprised was, the children say Nanami was their mother but their father was different. How will Starish, Quartet Night and Nanami Haruka handle th...
